--- alter_table_drop_constraint.sql
alter table foo drop constraint bar

--- AST
&ast.AlterTable{
  Alter: 0,
  Name:  &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 12,
        NameEnd: 15,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
    },
  },
  TableAlteration: &ast.DropConstraint{
    Drop: 16,
    Name: &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 32,
      NameEnd: 35,
      Name:    "bar",
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER TABLE foo DROP CONSTRAINT bar
